title: ellAm gurunAthan karuNai
sahitya:
ellAm gurunAthan karuNai tavam eNNiya eNNamum 
paNNiya puNNiyam kaNNan vaNNa malarp-padam naNNiyadiNNam


anupallavi

  allAduraviDam nEsam tavam AghAdu maraittiDum pAsham nAmam 
shollA dur guNattin AvEsham attanaiyum turatti enai aram uNartti
hari padam nirutti nirutti manattil nirutti vaittavan


caraNam    anda mighu hari guNam pADuvadum anda Anandattil aDiyArgaL 
kUruvadum anda cintanaiyil enai marandADuvadum uDan dEvaki 
bAlanuDan rAsam Oduvadum
tiramighu marai maNanda shollAnadu nilayoDu poruLAga ninradum
tIya vinai maramighutta vinai janma vinai sheyal maranda vinai
Anavai shenradum amudam kashanda attanai initta vArAi
AravAmudan hari nAmam uNarndadum aruLoDu kalandu tAngi
ninradum Anavamalla aghanradum jnAnam uNarndadum
